LanguageData.AcceptPatientsTooltip: Uncheck this if you want to stop patients from visiting.
LanguageData.AcceptSurgeryTooltip: Uncheck this if you do not want to get surgery events.
LanguageData.AcceptDangerTooltip: Check this if you want to override the check if the map if safe for patients to arrive
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsHospitalDesc: Whether this bed is for guest patients.
LanguageData.CommandBedSetAsSurgeryDesc: Whether this bed is for guest surgery patients.
